title: Allow your inner roadie to “Just Enjoy the Ride” with help from Serial1’s eBike guru
content:
Is it bike time? It’s bike time. But just because it’s bike time, doesn’t mean you have to venture deep into the pain cave. That’s part of the draw to eBike like those from Serial1, right? Even if you count yourself among the spandex-clad, on-your-left crowd, you will (probably) laugh out loud, at least once,

The post Allow your inner roadie to “Just Enjoy the Ride” with help from Serial1’s eBike guru appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
